artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,461); man at left (labeled No. 5) with a sword in a blue military uniform with a white vest and gold helmet with a red and a green plume; woman at right (labeled No. 6) in a patterned white and purple gown with a pink overgown, a bouquet of flowers at the décolletage, and a pink and white hat with a purple ribbon and six purple and pink plumes
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Troisième Cahier, 15 Mars 1790
